researchers_stance: V6 is a pure re-run of V5 (same copy, different random seed). The results confirm convergence: resonance 85% (±3pp from V5), intent 70% (±3pp), conversion 73% (+6pp from V5, -4pp from V4). The 3-run V4-V6 average establishes the true steady-state: 72% conversion, 83% resonance, 70% intent, 7% dealbreakers. The study is complete.
exec_summary: Pure convergence re-run. Same copy as V5, different random seed. All core metrics within expected noise bands. 3-run average (V4-V6) confirms true steady-state: 72% conversion, 83% resonance, 7% dealbreakers. Study complete.
findings:
• Convergence confirmed: V4-V6 three-run average provides the reliable steady-state estimate: 72% conversion.
  • Per-bucket averages stabilize: city_explorer 89%, fomo_scroller 81%, social_connector 72%, taste_curator 64%, journal_graveyard 56%.
  • Dealbreakers at 10%: Slightly above V5's 3% — within noise band. 3-run average: 7%.
  • All stopping criteria met: Conversion >50%, minimum 5 rounds, qualitative convergence, diminishing returns.
recommendations:
1. Finalize copy as V5: No further iteration needed.
  2. Generate final report: Full cross-version history, per-bucket deep dives, recommendations.
  3. Transition to Google Ads campaign planning: Prioritize city_explorer and fomo_scroller as Tier 1-2 segments.
  4. Share unresolved objections with product team: Passive tracking, community discovery, interface screenshots.
qualitative_themes:
• Total convergence: Every persona confirms 'same reaction as last round.' No new themes.
  • 'Confirmed: ship it' (all buckets): The qualitative signal is as converged as the quantitative signal.
clarity_notes: 100% nailed_it. Maintained across all rounds since V2.
appendix_notes: V6 is a pure re-run. No copy changes from V5. Results validate V4-V5 as the steady-state, not anomalies.

bucket_deep_dives.taste_curator:
75% conversion (V4-V6 avg: 64%)

9/12 converting. Recovered from V5's variance dip. 3-run average of 64% represents the true copy ceiling for this segment.
bucket_deep_dives.social_connector:
75% conversion (V4-V6 avg: 72%)

9/12 converting. 0% dealbreakers. 3-run average of 72%. Copy ceiling reached.
bucket_deep_dives.journal_graveyard:
50% conversion (V4-V6 avg: 56%)

6/12 converting. 4 dealbreakers — highest in this round. Structural ceiling confirmed at ~56%. Remaining blockers require product changes.
bucket_deep_dives.fomo_scroller:
67% conversion (V4-V6 avg: 81%)

8/12 converting — down from V5's 11/12 but within noise. 3-run average of 81% reflects the true steady-state for the study's most-improved bucket.
bucket_deep_dives.city_explorer:
100% conversion (V4-V6 avg: 89%)

12/12 converting. Perfect round. 0% dealbreakers — 'local trending' fully resolved the community discovery concern. 3-run average of 89%.
